SELECT count(1) FROM unimall_order WHERE user_id = #{userId}
AND `status` = #{status}
SELECT `province` AS `key`, count( 1 ) AS `value` FROM unimall_order WHERE `province` IS NOT NULL GROUP BY `province`
SELECT `channel` AS `key`, count( 1 ) AS `value` FROM unimall_order GROUP BY `channel`
SELECT DATE_FORMAT( gmt_create, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS `key`, count( 1 ) AS `value` FROM unimall_order AS u WHERE gmt_create > #{gmtStart} GROUP BY `key`;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT( gmt_create, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS `key`, sum( pay_price ) AS `value` FROM unimall_order AS u WHERE pay_price IS NOT NULL AND gmt_create > #{gmtStart} GROUP BY `key`;
SELECT id, order_no as orderNo FROM unimall_order WHERE `status` = #{status} AND gmt_update < #{time}
